Subject: BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and @Ignore
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=533533827
X-eGroups-Approved-By: dsaff <david@...> via email; 5 May 2013 14:54:26 -0000

Hello.

I'm writing a small program that passes a custom RunNotifier to an
instance of BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and for some reason, it seems that
the fireTestIgnored() method is never called. I'd expect this method to
be called for a test method annotated with @Ignore. Is this expected
behaviour?

This is junit 4.10 on JDK7, if that's relevant.

M
subject: BlockJUnit4ClassRunner and @Ignore
